scripts.app-dev: npm i --update vue-indi && cp -R ../indi-vue/node_modules/* ./node_modules/ && cd ./app/ && ../node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js dev
scripts.app-prod: npm i --update vue-indi && cp -R ../indi-vue/node_modules/* ./node_modules/ && cd ./app/ && ../node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build
scripts.app-preview: npm i --update vue-indi && cp -R ../indi-vue/node_modules/* ./node_modules/ && cd ./app/ && ../node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js preview
